## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves

What problem does this feature solve? Why do you need it?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or features?

## User Story

As a [type of user], I want [goal] so that [benefit].

## Mockups/Examples

If applicable, add mockups, wireframes, or examples from other apps.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, use cases, or examples about the feature request here.

## Implementation Suggestions

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented technically, share them here.

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - I can't use the app without this
- [ ] High - Significantly impacts my experience
- [ ] Medium - Would be nice to have
- [ ] Low - Not urgent

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have clearly described the feature and its benefits
- [ ] I have provided context and use cases
